title: JSON Markdown Page
excerpt: JSON content files support both markdown and HTML with automatic excerpt extraction.
description: This JSON file demonstrates markdown-to-HTML conversion
content:
# JSON Markdown Content

This content is **written in markdown** within a JSON file.

## Features

- Automatic markdown-to-HTML conversion
- Semantic HTML generation
- Backward compatibility maintained

The parser detects this is markdown and converts it to HTML automatically.
